Text.text: When we are on an ObjectPage in Edit mode, the Enter key can be used as a shortcut only if the focus is set on a field. The process executed by SAP Fiori elements depends on the entity set related to the field:
• If the entity set gets one or more SideEffects without SourceProperties and SourceEntities, the SideEffects are executed.
• Else, if the draftRoot entity set has a PreparationAction and the message is annotated (com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1.Messages), the PreparationAction is triggered and the messages are requested.
The purpose of this process is to immediately get the back-end messages related to the current draft.
